data.name: Dark Theme for TierMaker
data.description:
This is a Dark Theme for tiermaker.com a Tier Lists for Everything - TierMaker.

if you encountered any errors or have any feed-back please send a message to my

data.name: Surviv Roses
autoitscript Dark by BamaBraves
Penny Arcade - Ye Olde Style
data.description: Much like the old forums, only not. Attempts to mimic the appearance of the Penny Arcade forums prior to the 14/7/11 changeover, with light text on dark background. Thanks for ideas and many incorporated tweaks go to users in this thread http://forums.penny-arcade.com/discussion/144715/ui-custom-stylesheet-for-a-few-issues/

data.name: FBI OPEN UP rainbow 6 version
FuckYou - Classic Dark Mode - YouTube
data.description: Dark mode style of YouTube w/ logo replaced w/ FuckYou. Use with Tampermonkey, YouTube+ from Greasy Fork, and Get Me Old YouTube from Greasy Fork (links below). I suggest using the Stylus extension over the Stylish extension to inject CSS overrides with Userstyles.

data.name: Google Images Width x Height Dimensions
data.description: Overlays width x height in lower right corner of the thumbnails on Google Images Results pages when you hover the result. Inspired by https://support.mozilla.org/questions/1281440

data.name: Dark theme for pdicost
Dave's Improved Octaber
data.description:
I really like Octaber's orange-grey-black-ish colour scheme, but I prefer sharper and darker colours, so I introduced myself to CSS and edited some of the code to my liking. 

Compatibility:
This was just a very quick 1 to 2 hr edit, so although it is compatible with other styles, there are some flaws. But the main styles, hardcore mode and resizable textbox, should work fine with this style.

Use the dvorak discord server if there are any major issues with my code. You'll find me there.
